text: Ordered a pizza and they didn't put all of the ingredients that was ordered on it. So I called to let them know and the girl was absolutely rude. I will drive TO Bellefontaine or Marysville before I order another pizza from them. Pretty sad when I live a couple of minutes away from the gas station.
Mediocre carryout, gas station and Pizza shop. It's dirty, over priced and employees are not that friendly.  But you're paying for the middle of nowhere convenience.
We order pizza here frequently. The pizza is cut into squares. We have got taco, deluxe and pepperoni. The pepperoni is our favorite. Huge pizza sizes. The wings are good too.
